title: You’ve Unlocked a New Gift
headline: You’ve Unlocked a New Gift
subtitle: Kisama Drifter Annis 300R Livery
content:
Thank you for completing any First Dose mission on Hard difficulty without dying between January 12 and February 8. Your gift of the Kisama Drifter Annis 300R Livery will be available before February 17.

Stay tuned to the Rockstar Newswire for more limited-time events coming soon.
